item.title: Donator item only error

item.description:
@xd_own3d_xd wrote:

i tried to make a donator item only so when regular players wield it removes it, however i keep having a error whilst compiling
Heres the code

if(wearID == 7804 && (donator != 1)) {
sM(“You Need To Be A Donator To Wear This Item.”);
return false;
}

Heres the error

client.java:9368: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable wearID
location: class client
if(wearID == 7804 && (donator != 1)) {
^
client.java:9370: cannot return a value from method whose result type is void
return false;
^

Finished!
Press any key to continue . . .

Any help please
